tridonic.connecdim.webapi

Class connecdimSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdimSite

  • public class connecdimSite
extends java.lang.Object
    DALI site which is the physical location of the building that is associated with the connecdim cloud. Usually accessed with connecdim.getSites().get( x )
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaie Demaagd
